DOC.criteria: Men Women age 5580 Body Mass Index 2735 Non Diabetic Normal liver , kidney heart function within 10 % clinical normalcy Not currently follow weight loss special /non balance diet weight stable fast glucose > 110 mg/dl blood pressure > 160/110 mm Hg plasma total cholesterol > 260 mg/dl LDLcholesterol > 160mg/dl triacylglycerol > 400 mg/dl > 1 hour/week habitual aerobic /or resistance exercise Currently take prescribe blood thinner
